T02D2711:78b-1: shr'i dzny'a na ku na pha la n'a ma stu ti:/
T02D2711:78b-3: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
T02D2711:78b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2711:78b-5: gang gi blo gros sgrib gnyis sprin bral nyi ltar rnam dag rab gsal ba //
T02D2711:78b-6: ji snyed don kun ji bzhin gzigs phyir nyid kyi thugs kar glegs bam 'dzin //
T02D2711:78b-7: gang dag srid pa'i btson rar ma rig mun 'thoms sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i //
T02D2711:78b-8: 'gro tshogs kun la bu gcig ltar brtse yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs ldan gsung //
T02D2711:78b-9: 'brug ltar cher sgrogs nyon mongs gnyid slong las kyi lcags sgrog 'grol mdzad cing //
T02D2711:78b-10: ma rig mun sel sdug bsngal myu gu ji snyed gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams //
T02D2711:78b-11: gdod nas dag cing sa bcu'i mthar son yon tan lus rdzogs rgyal sras sku //
T02D2711:78b-12: bcu phrag bcu dang bcu gnyis rgyan spras bdag blo'i mun sel khyod la 'dud //
T02D2711:78b-13: gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gcig dang bdun dang /
T02D2711:78b-16: stong la sogs pa dag nyin re bzhin du sgrogs
T02D2711:78b-17: pa de ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2711:79a-1: pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs la sogs
T02D2711:79a-2: pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par
T02D2711:79a-3: 'gyur ro // gang zhig nyin re bzhin du lan
T02D2711:79a-4: gsum du bstod pa byed pa de ni ji skad
T02D2711:79a-5: bshad pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pas shes
T02D2711:79a-6: rab dang snying rje lam dang sa rnams rim gyis
T02D2711:79a-7: 'gyur ro // bgrod de / gong nas gong du
T02D2711:79a-8: ches cher 'phags nas myur du rnam pa thams cad
T02D2711:79a-9: mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin nas 'gro ba ma
T02D2711:79a-10: lus pa 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i ded dpon chen
T02D2711:79a-12: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhe bya ba'i
T02D2711:79a-14: bstod pa / slob dpon rdo rje mtshon chas mdzad
T02D2711:79a-15: 'gyur ro // bgrod de / por 'gyur ro // bstod pa / pa rdzogs so / //
T02D2711:79a-16: / rgya gar gyi pandi ta 'bum phrag gsum pa dang /
